title: Image
content:
What are the fonts for Baton Elementary School?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [baton.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725072438/http:/typophile.com/files/baton.jpg) | 116.13 KB |
author: irtownsend

comments.content:
/B & /E are set in **[Brush Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725072438/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Brush%20Script%20MT%20-%20Italic&fid=7655d129d0addb2f08a5c1dc994aaa4b&fsize=60&text=BE&fit=1)**  
".ATON .LEMENTARY" looks like **[Gill Sans (Bold Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725072438/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Gill%20Sans%20-%20Bold%20Italic&fid=f3888ec64dc561e7040a538793c977d0&fsize=60&text=ATON%20LEMENTARY&fit=1)**
